              <div class="iap55p0j_0_iap55p0jbg" id="comp-jfqia2egbg">
              </div>
              <div class="iap55p0j_0_iap55p0jinlineContent" id="comp-jfqia2eginlineContent">
               <div class="txtNew" data-packed="true" id="comp-jfqia2f8" style="top:381px;bottom:;left:20px;right:;width:932px;height:auto;position:absolute">
                <p class="font_8" style="font-size:16px;">
                 <span style="font-size:16px;">
                  All-in-one Command &amp; Control Centre solutions, which is combined features of KVM matrix, video wall processing, visualized control, central control and data centre management
                 </span>
                </p>
                <ul class="font_8" style="font-size:16px;">
                 <li>
                  <p class="font_8" style="font-size:16px;">
                   <span style="font-size:16px;">

                   </span>
